participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and active, Jordan enjoys outdoor activities and has a nurturing side as seen through her dog walking business.
participant_1.background: i also have a dog walking business. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. my father was a door to door salesman.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Playful and nostalgic, Alex has a quirky side with his extensive hat collection and a fondness for winter.
participant_2.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

content.text: i'm doing great , how about you ?
i don't but i work with someone at my part time job that does .
i'm living on a social security check not good . ðŸ™‰
